text: Rebecca Alie O'Connell (n√©e Romijn, born November 6, 1972) is an American movie and television series actress. She played Mystique in the X-Men movies and Alexis Meade in the television sitcom Ugly Betty. Romijn was born in Berkeley, California. Her father is Dutch. == References == == Other websites == * Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Berkeley, California Category:1972 births Category:Living people
title: Rebecca Romijn
